item.title: Report X-2025030149
item.description:
Report X-2025030149

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-16T21:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-03
  • City: GREER
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At the GSPR location a fiberboard box was found with signs of a release. Inside of the fiberboard box was a gasoline blower and the fuel tank was full of fuel. The cap of the tank was loose causing the gasoline to spill inside of the fiberboard box. There were no DG markings or paperwork required for transportation on fiberboard box. The shipment is being held at the location for the FAA.
